text: Visit here to check on the huge Merlion statue..! Lovely place with  great walkway. One can go up the statue of the Merlion with a nominal entry fee.

It's a park and an Island. It's big....,  so can get lost ðŸ˜‰! You need to be prepared well for a long walk.  Though there are escalators, who knows you might miss a spot...!  Get a map from the entrance, nd make up your mind on the path you would like to take. There r mono rails nd busses inside which is free. There r lot of activities inside for which additional tickets need to be purchased.  You will need at least 5hrs to cover the island in a rush... More time, the more you enjoy...!
Well managed parking lot for pick up of tourists...class apart cleanliness across the island...
Lovely and wonderful place for sight seeing and enjoyment of living in the world
Must know place for all travellers. Though it's confusing but their enough and more signages around to take you there ...
